regen.absent_element: displaying the controller's identity when initiating a call
regen.new_specification: The system shall display the controller's identity when the controller initiates a call and is automatically added into a multi-driver call.

regen.absent_element: displaying the controller's identity when joining calls with the lead cab
regen.new_specification: When a call involving the lead cab and a controller is established, the system shall display the identity of the controller to the lead cab driver.

regen.absent_element: displaying the controller's identity in the lead cab when the call is initiated by the controller
regen.new_specification: The system shall display the controller's identity in the lead cab when the call is initiated by the controller.

label: Functional identity of the automatically added controller shall be displayed in the leading cab.
absence: display the identity of the automatically added controller
